definition[0]: used to tell someone that you feel sorry for them because they have not succeeded in what they were trying to do
example[0]: ‘I failed my driving test.’ ‘Oh, hard luck!’
definition[1]: when bad things happen to you that are not your fault
example[1]: You’ve had your share of hard luck.
example[2]: It was hard luck on you.
definition[2]: used to say that you do not care if someone is having problems, does not like something etc
example[3]: If you don’t like the idea then hard luck!
